job.title: Software Engineer Mobile
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Financial Services,Investment Banking
job.description: <p>Our CONFIDENTIAL, growth client is hiring a Senior Mobile Engineer who has a strong aptitude for identifying opportunities to improve user experience, robust experience translating design into code, and a proactive desire to collaborate with fellow developers, designers, and product managers to build amazing apps. Position is full-time and reports to the Manager of Mobile Engineering.</p><p><br></p><p><strong>Responsibilities:</strong></p><ul><li>Collaborate with product managers, designers, and backend engineers to design and deliver high-quality products on iOS and Android.</li><li>Build efficient and reusable UI components and architect reliable, performant, and maintainable solutions.</li><li>Work alongside a team of talented engineers to continuously build, ship, learn, and iterate on our products.</li><li>Mentor and help develop a high-performing team of engineers.</li></ul><p><br></p><p><strong>Qualifications:</strong></p><ul><li>You have at least 2+ years of experience building mobile applications</li><li>You have used React Native to build cross-platform mobile applications</li><li>You are comfortable working with JavaScript/Typescript, but also not afraid to jump into Swift or Kotlin as needed</li><li>You have knowledge of mobile best practices and stay informed about innovations in the mobile industry</li><li>You have a strong understanding of UX/UI concepts and a demonstrated record of design sensibility</li></ul><p><br></p><p><strong>Preferred Qualifications:</strong></p><ul><li>Experience working with Bitcoin, Ethereum, and/or blockchain technology a huge plus</li><li>Experience working with Fastlane and/or build automation tooling</li></ul><p><br></p><p>Once you apply, we’ll send you all company information and a highlight of their leadership team.</p>
